Localization.Name: Musashi Industrial & Starflight Concern
Localization.Description: Mass produces very efficient, modular ships, mostly armored freighters of different sizes that make them the preferred brand for traders and larger corporations. Over thirty years ago, MISC signed a lend-lease agreement to establish a tech trade with Xi’An engineers.

English.Name: Musashi Industrial & Starflight Concern
English.Description: Mass produces very efficient, modular ships, mostly armored freighters of different sizes that make them the preferred brand for traders and larger corporations. Over thirty years ago, MISC signed a lend-lease agreement to establish a tech trade with Xi’An engineers.

Localization.Name: CR-60
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: MISC
Item Type: Fuel Pod
Flow Rate: 1.15 SCU/s
Capacity: 60 SCU

The standard fuel pod of the Starfarer, the CR-60 was designed by MISC to be a well balanced fuel storage option ready to tackle a wide variety of jobs.
